## Message Details

### Device Type
- [ ] Indoor
- [ ] Outdoor

### Message Information

**Message ID (hex):**
<!-- e.g., 0x4087 -->

**Message Name:**
<!-- e.g., Water Pump PWM % -->

### Message Type
- [ ] BoolMessage (Binary on/off state)
- [ ] EnumMessage (Enumerated value with defined states)
- [ ] FloatMessage (Numeric floating point value)
- [ ] BasicTemperatureMessage (Temperature value divided by 10)
- [ ] RawMessage (Undocumented/unknown message)
- [ ] BasicPowerMessage (Power state message)

**Enum Name (if EnumMessage):**
<!-- e.g., InOperationMode -->
